RESTRICTED 
NO.CAS-8(1)/2004-Div.I 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
‘A’ WING , JANPATH BHAWAN , 
 JANPATH, NEW DELHI-01 
Date: 22/10/2008 
 
 
CIRCULAR No. 11/2008 
 
Subject:- 
Facility of Access to the vehicle of His Holiness Jagadguru 
Sankaracharya 
Shri 
Swaroopanand 
Saraswati 
of 
Dwarka/Sharda Peeth upto the Tarmac at airports on Medical 
Grounds:   
 
 
 
Reference BCAS Circular No. 36/2005 dated 30/8/2005 on the subject 
cited above. 
  
 
2. 
His Holiness Jagadguru Sankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Saraswati of 
Dwarka/Sharda Peeth is permitted to avail  the  access of his vehicle up to  the 
tarmac, on medical grounds, during  his departure / arrival by air at all airports in 
the country for six months.  
 
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
 
Distribution as per list attached/overleaf.
